vectors.description: Compound AND: one sub-policy denies — access denied (v7.4.0)
Compound AND: all sub-policies grant — access allowed (v7.4.0)
Compound OR: all sub-policies deny — access denied (v7.4.0)
Compound OR: one sub-policy grants — access allowed (v7.4.0)
Hysteresis: previously granted personality stays granted between revoke and grant thresholds (v7.4.0)
Hysteresis: without previously_granted, grant threshold applies (v7.4.0)
Hysteresis: previously granted personality revoked below revoke threshold (v7.4.0)
Service agent with no delegation authority — valid (v6.0.0 scoped trust)
Sovereign agent with full delegation authority — valid (v6.0.0 scoped trust)

Saga where step 2 (transfer) failed, status is compensating, compensation_steps present to reverse reservation
Valid atomic saga with 3 completed steps, settled status, and settled_at timestamp
Saga where timeout was exceeded during transfer step, status failed with timeout error
Agent with untrusted delegation scope but non-empty delegation_authority — should fail
Agent missing required billing and inference scopes — should fail scope-coverage constraint
Agent with different trust levels per scope — valid
Invalid: demotion rule attempts forward transition (cold to warming). Demotion must go backward only.
Conservative community with high pseudo_count (k=10) and long decay half-life.
Default collection governance configuration with k=3 and standard thresholds.

Cross-language reference vector for domain-separated audit entry hashing. Other implementations (Python, Go, Rust) must produce identical hashes from the same inputs using RFC 8785 JCS canonicalization.
Valid credit lot with balanced conservation law
Valid fresh resource with score above threshold
Valid cold reputation with null personal_score

Valid community engagement signal: participation event with moderate weight.
